Package game

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.Body
city.cs.engine.StaticBody
game.Enemy
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bat, Monster, PumpkinMan, Skeleton, Zombie
public abstract class Enemy extends city.cs.engine.StaticBody
SuperClass Enemy that Represents all Enemies in the Game. Consists of StaticBodies that have common Attributes and properties that make up an enemy.

      shape - The shape of the enemy.
      EnemyHealth - The health of the enemy.
      EnemySpeed - The speed of the enemy.

    • TakenHit

      public void TakenHit()
      Method to handle actions when enemy is Taken a Hit. Subclasses can override this method to define specific behavior of when an enemy has Taken a Hit.
